name: Tune Snip
long: A full-stack web app designed to enhance music discovery and accessibility. Users can search for and identify songs, with detected tracks automatically stored in a NoSQL database for future reference. Additionally, the app offers personalized song recommendations based on user preferences.

name: Cosmic Crusaders
long: Collaborated with a team of 6 to develop a space shooting game featuring AI-powered enemies. Players can explore the environment, shoot asteroids for loot, and purchase power-ups at the in-game shop.

name: gRPC and Distributed File System
long: Implemented synchronous and asynchronous gRPC for remote procedure calls (RPCs) in file management. The application optimizes data transfer with chunking, ensures synchronization with mutexes to prevent race conditions, and improves file handling using write locks and unordered maps.
